titles.title: For the relief of Vincente Babauta Jesus and Rita Rios Jesus.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 10/19/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to two named individuals in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States arising from the death of their daughter as a result of negligent medical care on a certain ship.
